plot: An innocent bunch-up in Larry's trousers causes a misunderstanding with Cheryl's friend Nancy at the movies. He also manages to offend his friend Richard Lewis' new girlfriend.

In the premiere episode, Larry jokingly refers to his wife Cheryl as "Hitler", offending his manager Jeff's conservative Jewish parents. Since Jeff can't go to the movies with Larry, Cheryl sets Larry up with her friend. But a bunch-up in Larry's trousers creates many misunderstandings.—halo1k
